document_data.name: Society of the Jade Empress
document_data.orgname: the Society of the Jade Empress
document_data.mainbody: The '''Society of the Jade Empress''' was a secret society in [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.Description: The Society of the Jade Empress planned to reestablish the [[Hai dynasty]] on throne. For this, they wanted to kill all of the [[Chin dynasty]] imperial family, a very hard task. They were based in [[Hai Yuan]].
document_data.History: The Society of the Jade Empress had been planning their assassination plot for a long time. They gathered allies in most of the [[monasteries]] of Hai Yuan and killed many of the lowest-ranking local Shou bureaucrats.
